workflow_description: Navigate to Walmart homepage. Verify the hero headline contains 'Save money. Live better.'. Find and click the 'Shop Now' button.
master_plan:
Okay, here's a Master Test Plan for Walmart.com, focusing on Smoke Testing and initial mining strategies for future test automation.

# Master Test Plan: Walmart.com - Smoke Test & Initial Mining

**Document Version:** 1.0
**Date:** October 26, 2023
**Author:** AI QA Strategist

## 1. Introduction

This document outlines the Master Test Plan for Walmart.com, specifically focusing on smoke testing the core functionality and defining a strategy for mining relevant information for future test automation efforts. The goal is to quickly assess the health of the application after deployments or major changes and to guide the discovery process for more comprehensive testing.

## 2. Project Overview

*   **Target URL:** `https://www.walmart.com`
*   **Business Domain:** E-commerce
*   **Testing Type:** Smoke Testing (with strategic mining for future automation)
*   **User Goal:** Navigate to Walmart homepage, verify the hero headline contains 'Save money. Live better.', find and click the 'Shop Now' button.

## 3. Domain Information & Analysis

Walmart.com is a large-scale e-commerce platform offering a wide variety of products, from groceries and electronics to apparel and home goods.  Its primary business goals are:

*   **Drive Sales:**  Enable users to easily find and purchase products.
*   **Promote Value:** Emphasize competitive pricing and deals.
*   **Enhance User Experience:** Provide a seamless and intuitive shopping experience.
*   **Build Brand Loyalty:**  Offer services and features that encourage repeat customers.

**Key Areas of Focus for Testing (and Mining):**

*   **Homepage:**  The entry point for most users; crucial for brand messaging and navigation.
*   **Search Functionality:**  Critical for users to find specific products.
*   **Product Listing Pages (PLPs):**  Where users browse categories of products.
*   **Product Detail Pages (PDPs):**  Where users get detailed information about individual products.
*   **Shopping Cart & Checkout:**  The core conversion funnel; must be reliable and secure.
*   **Account Management:**  Allows users to manage their orders, payment methods, and personal information.

## 4. Smoke Test Suite Definition

The smoke test suite will focus on verifying the essential functionalities of Walmart.com.  These tests should be quick to execute and provide a high level of confidence in the stability of the application.

### 4.1. Test Environment

*   **Browser:** Chrome (latest version)
*   **Operating System:**  Windows 10/11 or macOS (latest version)

### 4.2. Test Cases

| Test Case ID | Description                                                                     | Steps                                                                                                                                                                       | Expected Result                                                                                                           | Priority |
|--------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------|
| ST-001       | **Website Availability** - Verify the Walmart homepage loads successfully.        | 1. Navigate to `https://www.walmart.com`                                                                                                                                 | 1. The Walmart homepage loads without errors.  2. HTTP Status code is 200.                                                  | High     |
| ST-002       | **Hero Headline Verification** - Check the main headline on the homepage.        | 1. Navigate to `https://www.walmart.com` 2. Locate the main hero headline.                                                                                              | 1. The hero headline contains the text "Save money. Live better.".                                                     | High     |
| ST-003       | **"Shop Now" Button Functionality** - Verify the 'Shop Now' button is present and navigates to the intended page. | 1. Navigate to `https://www.walmart.com` 2. Locate the 'Shop Now' button on the hero section. 3. Click the 'Shop Now' button.                                                               | 1. The 'Shop Now' button is present and clickable. 2. Clicking the button navigates to a relevant category page (e.g., Deals page). | High     |

## 5. Strategic Mining Instructions

These instructions will guide autonomous agents in identifying key elements and data points to be used in future, more comprehensive test automation efforts.

### 5.1. Homepage Mining

*   **Hero Section:**
    *   **Headline Text:** Extract the text of the main headline.
    *   **Button Links:**  Extract the `href` attribute of all buttons within the hero section.
    *   **Image Sources:** Extract the `src` attributes of all images within the hero section.
*   **Navigation Menu:**
    *   **Menu Item Text:** Extract the text of all top-level menu items.
    *   **Menu Item Links:** Extract the `href` attributes of all top-level menu items.
    *   **Sub-Menu Structure:**  Identify and map the hierarchical structure of sub-menus, including text and links.
*   **Footer:**
    *   **Footer Links:** Extract all `href` attributes in the footer.  Categorize these links (e.g., Customer Service, About Walmart, etc.).
    *   **Social Media Links:** Identify and extract links to Walmart's social media profiles.

### 5.2. Search Functionality Mining

*   **Search Bar:**
    *   **Placeholder Text:** Extract the placeholder text in the search bar.
    *   **Autocomplete Suggestions:**  Enter a partial search query (e.g., "app") and extract the autocomplete suggestions.
*   **Search Results Page (SRP):**
    *   **Product Titles:** Extract the titles of all products displayed in the search results.
    *   **Product Prices:** Extract the prices of all products displayed in the search results.
    *   **Product Image URLs:** Extract the `src` attributes of product images.
    *   **Sort/Filter Options:**  Identify and extract all available sort and filter options (e.g., Price, Rating, Brand).  Map the corresponding URL parameters.

### 5.3. Product Detail Page (PDP) Mining

*   **Product Information:**
    *   **Product Name:** Extract the full product name.
    *   **Price:** Extract the price.
    *   **Description:** Extract the product description.
    *   **Images:** Extract the `src` attributes of all product images (including thumbnails and zoom images).
    *   **Reviews:** If present, extract review ratings, number of reviews, and a sample of review text.
*   **"Add to Cart" Functionality:**
    *   **Button Text:** Extract the text of the "Add to Cart" button.
    *   **Quantity Selector:** Identify the element used to select the quantity of the product.
*   **Related Products:**
    *   **Identify Related Product Carousels:** Identify all carousels or sections displaying related products.
    *   **Extract Product Information:** Extract product titles, prices, and image URLs for related products.

## 6. Test Data

For smoke tests, no specific test data is required. The tests are designed to verify basic functionality with any valid data. For mining and future testing, random product searches will be used.

## 7. Risks and Mitigation

*   **Website Changes:**  Walmart.com is a dynamic website with frequent updates.  Changes to the UI may require updates to the test scripts and mining strategies.  *Mitigation:* Regularly review and update the test suite and mining instructions.
*   **Third-Party Integrations:** Walmart.com relies on numerous third-party integrations (e.g., payment gateways, shipping providers).  *Mitigation:*  Monitor the performance and availability of these integrations.

## 8. Metrics and Reporting

*   **Test Execution Rate:** Percentage of smoke tests that are executed successfully.
*   **Defect Density:** Number of defects found per test case.
*   **Test Coverage:** Percentage of key functionalities covered by the smoke test suite.

## 9. Future Considerations

*   **Expand Test Coverage:**  Extend the test suite to cover more critical functionalities, such as checkout, account management, and mobile app testing.
*   **Implement Data-Driven Testing:**  Use data from mining activities to create more robust and data-driven test cases.
*   **Integrate with CI/CD Pipeline:** Integrate the test suite into the CI/CD pipeline to automate testing as part of the development process.

This Master Test Plan provides a starting point for ensuring the quality of Walmart.com. It will be reviewed and updated periodically to reflect changes to the website and the evolving needs of the business.
